name: Muscle Magazine Vol. IV
entries: This tome contains tips, tricks, and hacks for improving ones body and physical form.
It can be read over 1 week to grant a creature an extra {@dice 10d4}â€™s to an Athletics or Acrobatics check made during downtime.
Alternatively, a creature reading it can instead read the book to increase their Barkeep, Dock Worker, General Laborer, Guard, or Instructor Wage Progression by 4
Once this book has been used in this way 4 times it becomes no longer magical. Reading the book can be done during leisure time which requires 8 hours of reading in that week.
